statistic.name: T-Test
statistic.description: This program run an independent samples t-test
statistic.rcode: # Data in two numeric vectors women_wt <- c(38.9, 61.2, 73.3, 21.8, 63.4, 64.6, 48.4, 48.8, 48.5) men_wt <- c(67.8, 60, 63.4, 76, 89.4, 73.3, 67.3, 61.3, 62.4) # Create a data frame df <- data.frame ( group = rep(c("Woman", "Man"), each = 9), weight = c(women_wt, men_wt) )
